original_text: We had made a raid against the Negeb of the Cherethites and against that which belongs to Judah and against the Negeb of Caleb, and we burned Ziklag with fire.”
korean_text: 우리가 그렛 사람의 남방과 유다에 속한 지방과 갈렙 남방을 침노하고 시글락을 불살랐나이다

sentences.original_text: We had made a raid against the Negeb of the Cherethites
and against that which belongs to Judah
and against the Negeb of Caleb
and we burned Ziklag with fire
